<section class="product-recommendations">
    <h2>Pairs Well With</h2>

    <div class="slider">

	<h2>Pairs Well With</h2>

	<div class="slider">
		{{> @product-tile}}

/* No context defined for this component. */
  • Content: 
    'use strict';

const slick = require('slick-carousel-browserify');

MF.productRecommendations = {
    init: () => {
        const recProducts = $('.product-recommendations .slider');
        const haveRecProducts = recProducts.length;

        if(haveRecProducts){
            slick(recProducts, {
                dots: false,
                speed: 500,
                prevArrow: '<button class="prev">Previous Slide</button>',
                nextArrow: '<button class="next">Next Slide</button>',
                slidesToShow: 3,
                slidesToScroll: 3,
                responsive: [
                    {
                        breakpoint: 768,
                        settings: {
                            slidesToShow: 2,
                            slidesToScroll: 2
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        breakpoint: 375,
                        settings: {
                            slidesToShow: 1,
                            slidesToScroll: 1
                        }
                    }
                ]
            })
        }
    }
};

module.exports = MF.productRecommendations;
  • URL: /components/raw/product-recommendations/_product-recommendations.js
  • Filesystem Path: pattern-library/patterns/01-components/product-recommendations/_product-recommendations.js
  • Size: 1.2 KB
  • Content: 
    .product-recommendations {
    padding: px-to-rem(48px) $gutter-sm 0 $gutter-sm;

    .slider {
        .slick-arrow {
            top: 30%;
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-xs) {
        .slider {
            .slick-arrow {
                top: 32%;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-s) {
        .product-tile {
            padding-right: $gutter-sm;
        }

        .slider {
            margin-right: -$gutter-sm;

            .slick-arrow {
                top: 23%;
            }

            .next {
                right: $gutter-sm;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-sm) {
        .slider {
            .slick-arrow {
                top: 27%;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ms) {
        .slider {
            .slick-arrow {
                top: 30%;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-m) {
        .slider {
            .slick-arrow {
                top: 28%;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ml) {
        padding: px-to-rem(80px) $gutter-xl 0 $gutter-xl;

        h2 {
            text-align: center;
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-lg) {
        h2 {
            margin-bottom: px-to-rem(48px);
        }

        .product-tile {
            padding-right: $gutter-m;
        }

        .slider {
            margin-right: -$gutter-m;

            .slick-arrow {
                top: 31%;
            }

            .next {
                right: $gutter-m;
            }
        }
    }
}

Image Size

The product image size needs to be 416x416px.
